description: [Ampify](http://ampify.net/) is an open source, decentralised, social platform. It is intended as a successor to the Open Web and as a replacement for closed platforms like iOS and Facebook by providing a web application framework to create social apps on top of a secure, decentralised core.
ohloh_description: Ampify is an open and decentralised application platform. See the README for more info and join in!
name: Ampify
